sentences.en: As a teacher, she had a reputation for eccentricity.
sentences.cn: 她是位教师，以行为古怪而出名。

sentences.en: Eccentricity is frowned on at Cambridge; at Oxford it is a cult.
sentences.cn: 特立独行在剑桥被 不屑一顾 而在牛津却备受推崇.

sentences.en: He soon exhibited signs of eccentricity.
sentences.cn: 他的怪异举止很快显露出来。

sentences.en: Here are a few stories which indicate the originality, not to say eccentricity, of his character.
sentences.cn: 这里有几个故事,表明了他奇特而并非怪僻的性格.

sentences.en: His eccentricity had become legendary long before he died.
sentences.cn: 在他去世之前他的古怪脾气就早已闻名遐尔了.

sentences.en: I can't understand the eccentricity of Henry's behavior.
sentences.cn: 我不理解亨利的古怪举止.

sentences.en: Kate’s mother had a reputation for eccentricity.
sentences.cn: 凯特的母亲是个出了名的怪人。

sentences.en: My favorite eccentricity is to go surfing by moonlight.
sentences.cn: 我最喜欢的怪行是在月光下冲浪.

sentences.en: She is unusual to the point of eccentricity.
sentences.cn: 她特立独行到了古怪的地步。

sentences.en: The dimensions or prestressing force and eccentricity require modification.
sentences.cn: 尺寸或预加力和偏心需要修改.

sentences.en: The name Picasso may evoke images of wealth, eccentricity, genius and power.
sentences.cn: 毕加索的名字可能使人联想起财富 、 怪僻 、 天才和权力.

sentences.en: The present - day eccentricity of the orbit is small.
sentences.cn: 目前,轨道的偏心率不大.

sentences.en: There was a word for it in Newspeak : ownlife, it was called, meaning individualism and eccentricity.
sentences.cn: 新话里竟然还有个词儿专说这一点, 那词便叫做独活 —— 这意味着个人主义,性情怪僻.

sentences.en: This was an innate eccentricity and love of embroidery, I do not know why.
sentences.cn: 这是我们固有的一种怪癖,喜欢修饰,究竟如何, 我就不知道了.

sentences.en: Thus the bearing parameter B and eccentricity ratio U.
sentences.cn: 因此,用了轴承参数B和质量偏心率U为基本参数,来说明分析失效的方法.

sentences.en: Your eccentricity and conceit touch the verge of frenzy.
sentences.cn: 你这种反常和自负的行径已经是接近疯狂了.

phrases.tran_cn: 偏心率；偏心率比；偏心比

trans.tran_cn: 古怪，反常，怪癖，[物]偏心距，[数]离心率
trans.tran_en: Eccentricity is unusual behaviour that other people consider strange
